section.title: Enterprise Security & Compliance
section.subtitle: Bank-Grade Protection
section.description: Advanced security measures that exceed UAE regulatory requirements and international standards

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Military-grade AES-256 encryption for all voice, data, and communication channels
features.benefit: Complete protection of sensitive business communications

features.title: Zero-Downtime Architecture
features.description: 99.99% uptime guarantee with redundant infrastructure and automatic failover

features.title: AI Threat Detection
features.description: Real-time monitoring and automatic response to security threats and anomalies

features.title: Compliance Auditing
features.description: Automated compliance tracking for TRA, GDPR, ISO 27001, and SOC 2 standards
features.benefit: Effortless regulatory compliance and audit readiness

features.title: Data Sovereignty
features.description: UAE-based data centers ensuring local data storage and processing requirements
features.benefit: Meet local data residency laws and regulations

features.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
features.description: Advanced authentication protocols with biometric and token-based security
features.benefit: Prevent unauthorized access to sensitive systems
